title: Battery issue
content:
I have been trying to contact Google since few months now.
I have another phone Google pixel.
The battery is dead it can not b used without external battery attatched to it 24*7 memory problem.
Gets hang
Mic issue
My phone was repaired not less then a year back mother board n all were changed.
I don't expect such service by Google. Kindly get in touch for this. It's v difficult
